text: @piersmorgan Matt I am immune I have had Covid19 Hardcourt (woops got his name wrong). MH probably thinks he is immune but no evidence as yet to back this up. Pity the poor chap he put his arm round and does MH really care - I don't think so! Another backer of Domcum who also didn't care.
